page.title: 09LEOMINSTER CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: We play games all the year round. In winter we play more indoor games such as card and board games like Snap, Chess, Monoply and Snakes and Ladders. Sometimes we play computer games. Outside the boys enjoy playing football and running games. In the autumn they like to play conkers. The girls play netball, hockey and running games. In summer the boys play football and marbles, whilst the girls enjoy skipping games and action-song games. We also play sports such as jumping and racing. Sometimes we make up our own games. Usually the boys and girls do not play with each other but sometimes they do.
